TextLibrary.Text: You are a kind and wonderful person! My gold and my ring are not nearly enough to express my gratitude.

You are a kind and wonderful person! My gold and my ring are not nearly enough to express my gratitude.
What will you do now?
What will you do now?
What will you do now?
What will you do now?
I have been thinking about that. I have enjoyed our travels together, and...
I have been thinking about that. I have enjoyed our travels together, and...
I have been thinking about that. I have enjoyed our travels together, and...
I have been thinking about that. I have enjoyed our travels together, and...
What?
What?
What?
What?

I was hoping that, perhaps, I could join you. I can be very useful! I am highly skilled in the art of persuasion. If you fight any foes who are noble and kind like yourself, I can give you an advantage.

I was hoping that, perhaps, I could join you. I can be very useful! I am highly skilled in the art of persuasion. If you fight any foes who are noble and kind like yourself, I can give you an advantage.
Yes...for now you can join me. But my travels will take me down many dark paths in the days to come. You might change your mind about following me rather quickly.
